body: An old veteran or beloved hero who either attended your academy or is otherwise associated with its traditions comes to visit. The visit lasts 2d6 days, during which you gain 1 point of Influence each day. The visitor demands a significant amount of your personal time. If you don't spend the majority of your time each day wining and dining your visitor, she loses interest and leaves, costing you 2d6 points of Influence.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Downtime/Downtime Events/Military Academy Events/Famous Alumnus
name: Famous Alumnus
